post_title: FS - T206 Chief Meyers Portrait (slight name at top), Tolstoi - SGC 2.5
post_content: For Sale - T206 Chief Meyers Portrait with slight name at top, Tolstoi - SGC 2.5. Very sharp card, price includes shipping, please message if interested.  $250 venmo no fee or $260 pp gs.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.  Bob I.
